column2: "Nna Paul aka ato hɔ dɛ ɔbɛpa Efeso ho
column3: amma ɔaannkɛkyɛr wɔ Asia; na ɔpɛɛ ntsɛm ma sɛ ɔbɛyɛ a
column4: oeekodu Jerusalɛm Pentekost da no."

column2: "Na ofii Miletus somae kɔr Efeso kɛfrɛɛ asɔr mpanyimfo no."

column3: ɔsee hɔn dɛ: Homankasa hom nyim mbrɛ ofitsi da a odzi kan a mebaa Asia no
column4: menye hom tsenae wɔ aber no nyina mu
column6: "medze adwen mu ahobrɛadze nye nyinsu pii mosoom Ewuradze
column7: nye nsɔhwɛ a ɔbaa mo do ɔnam Jewfo pempɛn a wɔpempɛɛn me no do:"

column2: "mbrɛ mannwodow ho dɛ mebɛka hom biribiara a ɔyɛ hom mfaso na mekae na mekyerɛkyerɛɛ hom guado nye efiefi
column4: "na midzii dase maa Jewfo nye Griikfo so wɔ nnuho a ɔkɔ Nyankopɔn do
column5: nye gyedzi a ɔkɔ hɛn Ewuradze Jesus Kraest do no ho."

column2: "M'enyi ammber obiara no dwɛɛtɛɛ anaa ne sika anaa n'atar."
